when you eat sugary Foods your body

glucose then triggers your body to

brains are naturally wired to find and

need energy to survive this is also why
sugar activates parts of our brains that

this in turn releases dopamine which

healthier choices food and science

over time your perception of sweetness
intensity changes that's why experts

add a little bit less over time that way
you'll still be able to taste the

oreatingwell.com said that eliminating

sweetened beverages can often be the

believes that just by choosing a glass
of water with a squeeze of lime or
orange for flavor you can dramatically
reduce your sugar intake for that day
finally Michael danzinger MD from WebMD
